title: Cognitive Load Theory-Based Library Education Guide: Enhancing Scientific Research Efficiency

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Customized education for current practitioners (graduate students/researchers), emphasizing digital information literacy.

learning_goals: Learners can apply advanced search strategies in science databases with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can explain three or more cognitive strategies for selecting key materials in information-overload situations.
Learners can design a systematic reference management process of three or more stages for research topics.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
